categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic awards

nodes.text: The Silver Talons was the second embellishment of the Kalidor Crescent, the highest honor awarded by the Alliance to Restore the Republic. The Kalidor Crescent was awarded for extreme acts of heroism and gallantry against an overwhelming force. The Silver Talons was given after a live individual performed a third instance of heroism and gallantry and had previously been awarded the Bronze Cluster. It was a set of polished silver talons that were added to the kalidor.
